title: Phase 4 - Dashboard & Notifications
description:
Staff interface for managing callbacks (optional phase).

## Goals
- Staff queue UI (minimal)
- SMS/email notifications
- Searchable summaries and transcripts
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Streamlit dashboard shows callback queue
- [ ] Callbacks sortable by priority, time, status
- [ ] Click callback → see full transcript + summary
- [ ] SMS notification sent on new high-priority callback
- [ ] Email notification with summary sent to staff
- [ ] Search bar finds callbacks by phone, name, or keywords
- [ ] UI accessible on mobile (responsive)
- [ ] Integration test: new callback → SMS received within 60s

title: Phase 2 - LLM Orchestration
description:
AI-driven conversation with tool calling.

## Goals
- LLM orchestration with tool/function calling
- State machine-driven dialog
- Create/update call record
- Create callback task with summary
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] LLM provider interface defined with ABC
- [ ] OpenAI adapter implements tool calling
- [ ] State machine transitions: INIT→GREET→LANGUAGE_SELECT→CLASSIFY→INTENT→INFO→CONFIRM→CALLBACK→END
- [ ] All tool schemas validated with Pydantic (create_call_record, create_callback_task, etc.)
- [ ] Bilingual prompts for each state work correctly
- [ ] Callback task created with: name, number, intent, best time, summary
- [ ] Unit tests for state machine transitions (100% state coverage)
- [ ] Integration test: full conversation flow → callback task in DB
- [ ] Guardrails enforced: no SSN/DOB/payment collection

title: Phase 1 - STT/TTS Loop
description:
Speech recognition and synthesis integration.

## Goals
- Speech-to-text integration (pluggable)
- Text-to-speech integration (pluggable)
- Simple menu logic in English/Spanish
- Store transcript and call duration
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] STT provider interface defined with ABC
- [ ] TTS provider interface defined with ABC
- [ ] Deepgram adapter implements both STT and TTS
- [ ] Bilingual menu works: "Press 1 for English, 2 for Spanish" / "Presione 1 para inglés, 2 para español"
- [ ] Transcripts stored in DB with language metadata
- [ ] Unit tests for STT/TTS adapters (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test: recorded audio → accurate transcription
- [ ] TTS output sounds natural in both languages

title: Define STTProvider interface
description:
Create abstract base class for speech-to-text providers.

## Methods to define
- transcribe(audio_bytes, language) -> TranscriptResult
- transcribe_stream(audio_stream, language) -> AsyncIterator[TranscriptChunk]
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] ABC defined at vozbot/speech/stt/base.py
- [ ] TranscriptResult dataclass: text, confidence, language, duration
- [ ] TranscriptChunk for streaming: partial_text, is_final
- [ ] Language parameter supports "en" and "es"
- [ ] Async methods for non-blocking I/O
- [ ] Tests verify ABC cannot be instantiated
- [ ] Type hints complete with mypy passing

title: Define TTSProvider interface
description:
Create abstract base class for text-to-speech providers.

## Methods to define
- synthesize(text, language, voice) -> AudioResult
- get_available_voices(language) -> list[Voice]
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] ABC defined at vozbot/speech/tts/base.py
- [ ] AudioResult dataclass: audio_bytes, format, duration, sample_rate
- [ ] Voice dataclass: id, name, language, gender
- [ ] Language parameter supports "en" and "es"
- [ ] Audio format configurable (mp3, wav, pcm)
- [ ] Tests verify ABC cannot be instantiated
- [ ] Type hints complete with mypy passing

title: Phase 3 - Escalation & Transfer
description:
Human handoff capabilities.

## Goals
- Transfer call to human (if configured)
- Fallback to callback task if transfer fails
- Escalation triggers enforced
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Call transfer via Twilio works to configured number
- [ ] Escalation triggers detected: "human", "agent", "emergency", legal keywords
- [ ] Failed transfer gracefully falls back to callback task
- [ ] Transfer timeout configurable (default 30s)
- [ ] Unit tests for escalation trigger detection (>90% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test: say "speak to a human" → transfer initiated
- [ ] Integration test: transfer fails → callback task created

title: Phase 0 - Telephony Skeleton
description:
No AI yet. Build core telephony infrastructure.

## Goals
- Inbound PSTN number reachable via Twilio
- Answer call, play static audio prompt
- Record caller audio to storage
- Save minimal call metadata to DB
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Twilio webhook receives inbound calls
- [ ] Call answered within 2 rings
- [ ] Static audio prompt plays successfully (English + Spanish)
- [ ] Call metadata persisted to Postgres (from_number, timestamp, duration)
- [ ] Audio recording saved to cloud storage
- [ ] Unit tests pass for telephony adapter (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test: place real call → verify DB record created
- [ ] Docker compose brings up all services without error

title: Scaffold repo structure
description:
Create the project directory structure and config files.

## Deliverables
- Directory structure per README spec
- pyproject.toml with dependencies
- docker-compose.yml for Postgres + Redis
- .env.example template
- Makefile with common commands
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] All directories created: vozbot/{telephony,speech,agent,storage,queue}/
- [ ] pyproject.toml valid: `pip install -e .` succeeds
- [ ] FastAPI, Pydantic, SQLAlchemy, pytest, twilio in dependencies
- [ ] docker-compose.yml starts Postgres and Redis: `docker-compose up -d` succeeds
- [ ] .env.example contains all vars from README
- [ ] Makefile has: install, test, dev, lint targets
- [ ] Python package importable: `python -c "import vozbot"`

title: Define TelephonyAdapter interface
description:
Create abstract base class for telephony providers.

## Methods to define
- answer_call(call_id) -> None
- hangup_call(call_id) -> None
- transfer_call(call_id, target_number) -> bool
- play_audio(call_id, audio_url) -> None
- get_call_info(call_id) -> CallInfo
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] ABC defined at vozbot/telephony/adapters/base.py
- [ ] All methods have type hints and docstrings
- [ ] CallInfo dataclass defined with: call_id, from_number, to_number, status, started_at
- [ ] Tests verify ABC cannot be instantiated directly
- [ ] Interface is async-compatible (async def methods)

title: Implement Twilio adapter
description:
Implement TelephonyAdapter for Twilio.

## Components
- TwilioAdapter class implementing TelephonyAdapter
- TwiML generation for call control
- Webhook handlers for incoming calls
- Environment config for Twilio credentials
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] TwilioAdapter extends TelephonyAdapter ABC
- [ ] answer_call generates valid TwiML response
- [ ] play_audio generates <Play> TwiML
- [ ] transfer_call generates <Dial> TwiML
- [ ] Webhook endpoint at /webhooks/twilio/voice receives calls
- [ ] Twilio signature validation on webhooks
- [ ] Unit tests with mocked Twilio client (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test with Twilio test credentials

title: Create storage schema (SQLAlchemy models)
description:
Define database models per README spec.

## Models
- Call: id, from_number, language, customer_type, intent, status, summary, transcript, costs, timestamps
- CallbackTask: id, call_id, priority, assignee, name, callback_number, best_time_window, notes, status, timestamps
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Call model at vozbot/storage/db/models.py
- [ ] CallbackTask model with FK to Call
- [ ] All fields from README data model present
- [ ] Enum types for: language (en/es), customer_type, status
- [ ] Indexes on: from_number, status, created_at
- [ ] Tests verify model constraints (not null, foreign keys)
- [ ] Pydantic schemas for API serialization

title: Set up Alembic migrations
description:
Configure Alembic for database migrations.

## Deliverables
- Alembic config in vozbot/storage/migrations/
- Initial migration creating calls + callback_tasks tables
- Migration script in Makefile
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] alembic.ini configured for project
- [ ] env.py loads DATABASE_URL from environment
- [ ] Initial migration creates both tables
- [ ] `make migrate` runs pending migrations
- [ ] `make migrate-new MSG="..."` creates new migration
- [ ] Migrations work on fresh Postgres container
- [ ] Rollback tested: upgrade then downgrade succeeds

title: Implement basic call flow (answer + static prompt)
description:
Wire everything together for basic call handling.

## Flow
1. Twilio webhook receives call
2. Answer with bilingual greeting
3. Play static audio prompt
4. Record call metadata to DB
5. Hang up
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] /webhooks/twilio/voice endpoint answers calls
- [ ] Bilingual greeting plays: "Hello... Hola..."
- [ ] Call metadata saved: from_number, started_at, status=completed
- [ ] Audio prompt files exist in static/ directory
- [ ] Call duration tracked
- [ ] Error handling: DB failure doesn't crash call
- [ ] Integration test: ngrok + real Twilio call → DB record
- [ ] Logs show call lifecycle: received → answered → completed
